description: This source file implements session management functions for the CCSP (Common Component Software Platform) CR (Component Registrar). It provides functions to request a new session ID, retrieve the current session info, and end a session. The code manages session state and handles associated session IDs and priorities.

methods.name: int CcspCrRequestSessionID(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG uPriority,ULONG * pulSessionID)
methods.description: Requests a new session ID with specified priority. If a session is already in progress with a higher priority, it returns an error. Otherwise, it increments the session ID counter, updates session state, and optionally returns the new session ID.

methods.name: int CcspCrGetCurrentSessionID(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG * pulPriority,ULONG * pulSessionID)
methods.description: Retrieves the current session ID and priority if a session is active; otherwise, returns zero values.

methods.name: int CcspCrInformEndOfSession(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulSessionID)
methods.description: Ends the current session if the provided session ID matches the active one, resetting session state to indicate no active session.
